code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function FlightCard(_ref){let{flight}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transport-card",role:"article","aria-label":"".concat(flight.airline," ").concat(flight.flightNumber),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:flight.img,alt:"".concat(flight.airline," ").concat(flight.flightNumber)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"price-badge",children:new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN',{style:'currency',currency:'INR'}).format(flight.price)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transport-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[flight.airline," \u2014 ",flight.flightNumber]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"muted",children:[flight.from," \u2192 ",flight.to]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"muted",children:["Dep: ",flight.departure," \u2022 Arr: ",flight.arrival," \u2022 ",flight.duration]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"rating-badge",children:["\u2708\uFE0F ",flight.class||'Economy']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/booking/".concat(flight.id),className:"btn",children:"View / Book"})]})]})]});}
